content.question: The No Child Left Behind Act (NCLB) required states to implement standards-based education reform in order to receive federal funds. Which of the following criticisms of NCLB is being expressed in the cartoon?

choices.label: Education standards for sports achievements are set unrealistically high, and equipment is poorly managed.
Education standards for boys are more difficult than for girls, even though educational resources are the same.
Education resources are being systematically reduced, while education standards are becoming more unreachable.
Education resources for elementary school students are being trimmed, while education standards for high school students are being raised.

content.answer: Education resources are being systematically reduced, while education standards are becoming more unreachable.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Describe the argument, perspective, evidence, and reasoning presented in the source.
